Segment.name: BCM
Segment.comment: To indicate the beginning of the contractor cost data reports and transmit identifying numbers, descriptions, action codes, program and contract type, funding identification, and security level

Field.name: TransactionSetPurposeCode
Field.comment: Code identifying purpose of transaction set

Field.name: Date1
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: Date2
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ContractActionCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the expected resultant type of contract action or current type of contract action

Field.name: SecurityLevelCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of confidentiality assigned by the sender to the information following

Field.name: CurrencyCode
Field.comment: Code (Standard ISO) for country in whose currency the charges are specified
